attributes.action: Immediately present to Parliament proposals to abolish MPs' second homes allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Refurbish and furnish Chelsea barracks (preferably, but any Government owned buildings will suffice) as accommodation for MPs whose constituency is outside London. Provide transport (bus) to Parliament every 15 mins. Give same MPs a daily food allowance for each day that Parliament sits.

rejection.details: Issues relating to MPs' expenses are a matter for Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
